DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a card, draw #b1 card and apply #b1 #yDrench to a random enemy (once per turn per unique cost). Upon exiting this #yStance, draw #b2 cards.
Burned creatures turn to ash when their burn exceeds their HP. Burn application scales with #yVigor.
Your next card is #b50% more effective.
Once #b10 #yChill is acquired, it is consumed to apply #b1 #yFreeze.
Confused creatures have a #b50% change to attack either themselves or an ally.
Dizzy creatures have a #b50% chance to miss their #yAttacks.
UNUSED! Dodgy creatures have a #b50% chance to evade #yAttacks.
Combines with #yBurn to spread damage and additional #yBurn, accelerates #yChill application, and increases #yElectric damage.
This card has an alternate form in a different #yStance.
This card has an alternate form in #yVeil.
This card has an alternate form in #yAbyss.
This card has an alternate form in #ySmoke.
This card has an alternate form in #yHuge.
This card has an alternate form in #yHyper.
When attacked, deals damage back. When attacking, deals additional damage. Electric application scales with #yCharge.
Applying #yFreeze has a #b50% chance to apply #b6 #yBurn. NL Applying #yBurn has a #b25% chance to gain #b1 #yCharge. NL Gaining #yCharge has a #b10% chance to gain #b1 #yElectric.
This creature dies after this many turns.
Any card with the word "Fist" in its name.
Frozen creatures are unable to act, but are also invincible.
Hexed creatures lose HP when they attack. If the creature does not attack, Hex is halved.
Your Attacks deal double damage. Lose [E] each time you play an attack.
Your Attacks deal #b20% more damage and you take #b20% less damage from attacks. Upon exiting this #yStance, gain 2 #yCharge.
UNUSED! Target takes double damage from #yBurn.
UNUSED! Shrunk creatures deal #b25% less damage and take #b50% more damage.
Retain your hand at the end of your turn. Upon taking unblocked attack damage, discard all cards and take #b1 less damage per card discarded this way.
Soft creatures take #b3 more damage from #yAttacks.
A useless card with no effect.
A stunned target does nothing this turn.
Enter the #yStance if you are not in it. Exit the #yStance if you are in it.
Your Attacks deal half damage and you take half damage from attacks.
